news.title: At the Gates’ Tomas Lindberg Dies at 52
news.summary: Lindberg fronted the beloved and influential Swedish death metal band, as well as several other projects twining melody and extreme music

news.title: They Are Gutting a Body of Water Share Video for New Song “RL Stine”: Watch
news.summary: The fourth preview of the shoegaze band’s Lotto

news.title: Cardi B Announces 2026 Arena Tour
news.summary: The rapper will play North American shows next year in support of sophomore album Am I the Drama?

news.title: Game, New Feature Film From Geoff Barrow Starring Sleaford Mods’ Jason Williamson, Gets First Trailer: Watch
news.summary: Barrow co-wrote and produced the movie for his Invada Films company, directed by John Minton and co-starring Marc Bessant

news.title: Coachella 2026 Lineup: Sabrina Carpenter, Justin Bieber, Karol G, the Strokes, and More
news.summary: The xx, Young Thug, Turnstile, David Byrne, FKA twigs, Addison Rae, Ethel Cain, and dozens more are heading to Indio, California, in April
